# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G. Victores 2014

set(KEYWORD "StateMachineLib")

find_package(YARP REQUIRED)

add_library(${KEYWORD} MockState.hpp
                       MockState.cpp
                       State.hpp
                       State.cpp
                       StateDirector.hpp
                       StateDirector.cpp
                       StateMachine.hpp
                       StateMachine.cpp
                       StateMachineBuilder.hpp
                       StateMachineBuilder.cpp
                       YarpStateDirector.hpp
                       YarpStateDirector.cpp)

target_include_directories(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC YARP::YARP_OS
                                 PRIVATE UtilsLib)
